name: precooked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of food) cooked before it is needed so that it can be heated and then eaten at a later time: Sales of precooked meals have risen sharply over the past few years. The company sells precooked rice in a pouch. See
precook
More examplesFewer examplesHe thinks soaking and cooking dried beans is far tastier than eating precooked canned beans.Instant noodles are dried or precooked noodles fused with oil, and often sold with a packet of flavoring.Don't buy precooked shrimp; they will end up overcooked in your dishes.
